import { NavTree } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyLink from '!!raw-loader!./Link'
import storyParentIcon from '!!raw-loader!./ParentIcon'

<Meta component={NavTree} title="Docs/NavTree" />

# NavTree

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

`NavTree`, along with its companion component `NavTreeItem`, renders a collapsible list of items. However, unlike standard `ul` and `li` elements, `NavTree` and `NavTreeItem` come prebuilt with a number of props to simplify item style and behavior customization.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## As Links

A `NavTree` component will behave as a link by providing  `href` and `target` props.

<Editor code={storyLink} />

## Nested

A `NavTree` component can also be nested within  another `NavTree`. 

<Editor code={storyParentIcon} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={NavTree} exclude={excludedProps} />
